title.ja: 難聴の遺伝子解析と臨床応用に関する研究
title.en: Genetic Analysis of Hearing Loss and Its Clinical Application

ja.text: 様々な難聴および外耳・中耳・内耳奇形の原因遺伝子変異の解明と臨床診断への応用
ja.rawHtml: 目的： 様々な難聴および外耳・中耳・内耳奇形の原因遺伝子変異の解明と臨床診断への応用

en.text: To identify the causative gene mutation of hearing impairment including non-syndromic hearing loss, syndromic hearing loss, and inner, middle, outer ear malformation.
en.rawHtml: Aims: To identify the causative gene mutation of hearing impairment including non-syndromic hearing loss, syndromic hearing loss, and inner, middle, outer ear malformation.

ja.text: 既知の難聴関連遺伝子領域の塩基配列を、Ion PGM、Ion Proton、HiSeq 2000、IonS5を用いて決定する
ja.rawHtml: 方法： 既知の難聴関連遺伝子領域の塩基配列を、Ion PGM、Ion Proton、HiSeq 2000、IonS5を用いて決定する

en.text: Massively Parallel DNA Sequencing was performed with an Ion Torrent Personal Genome Machine (PGM), Ion Proton or Ion S5 system using the Ion PGM 200, Proton HiQ Sequencing Kit and Ion 318 Chip or Ion P1 chip (Thermo Fisher Scientific) or 540 chip chef kit (S5) or HiSeq 2000 system (Illumina).
en.rawHtml: Methods: Massively Parallel DNA Sequencing was performed with an Ion Torrent Personal Genome Machine (PGM), Ion Proton or Ion S5 system using the Ion PGM 200, Proton HiQ Sequencing Kit and Ion 318 Chip or Ion P1 chip (Thermo Fisher Scientific) or 540 chip chef kit (S5) or HiSeq 2000 system (Illumina).

ja.text: 症候群性難聴 (Usher症候群) : 17症例非症候群性難聴: 39症例 (制限公開) ＋5症例 (非制限公開) ＋19症例 (制限公開) ＋19症例 (制限公開) ＋39症例 (制限公開) ＋1症例 (制限公開) ＋28症例 (制限公開) ＋7症例 (制限公開) ＋26症例 (制限公開) ＋15症例 (制限公開) ＋2969症例 (制限公開)
ja.rawHtml: 対象： 症候群性難聴（Usher症候群）：17症例 　　　 非症候群性難聴：39症例（制限公開）＋5症例（非制限公開）＋19症例（制限公開）＋19症例（制限公開）＋39症例（制限公開）＋1症例（制限公開）＋28症例（制限公開）＋7症例（制限公開）＋26症例（制限公開）＋15症例（制限公開）＋2969症例（制限公開）

en.text: Usher Syndrome: 17 patients Non-usher syndrome: 39 patients (Controlled-access) + 5 patients (Unrestricted-access) + 19 patients (Controlled-access) + 19 patients (Controlled-access) + 39 patients (Controlled-access) + 1 patient (Controlled-access) + 28 patients (Controlled-access) + 7 patient (Controlled-access) + 26 patients (Controlled-access) + 15 patients (Controlled-access) + 2969 patients (Controlled-access)
en.rawHtml: Participants/Materials: Usher Syndrome: 17 patients 　　　　　　 　 　     　Non-usher syndrome: 39 patients (Controlled-access) + 5 patients (Unrestricted-access) + 19 patients (Controlled-access) + 19 patients (Controlled-access) + 39 patients (Controlled-access) + 1 patient (Controlled-access) + 28 patients (Controlled-access) + 7 patient (Controlled-access) + 26 patients (Controlled-access) + 15 patients (Controlled-access) + 2969 patients (Controlled-access)
